title: Testimonials
subTitle: From colleagues to clients, see what others say

contents.title: "Xiaohan is an enthusiastic frontend developer with a keen eye for detail"
text: Always looking to learn and sharpen his skillset. Xiaohan has demonstrated great potential with a hunger to progress quickly in a pressured environment. He does all this with an approachable attitude and a positive outlook. A great hire.

contents.title: "Xiaohan has been very helpful and professional and came up with lot's of great ideas"
text: Thank you Xiaohan, I love it. Xiaohan has been very helpful and professional and came up with lot's of great ideas. I highly recommend 👍🫶

contents.title: "On a professional level Xiaohan is an enthusiastic and dedicated front end developer with a real passion for his work"
text: I worked with Xiaohan during his time at W2 Global Data. I can say this, on a professional level Xiaohan is an enthusiastic and dedicated front end developer with a real passion for his work. He has the potential to become a rising star in this field, with a thirst for knowledge and a willingness to better himself. On a personal level, he is a joy to be around and an asset to any team who is lucky enough to have him as a member. I would not hesitate to either employ him or work with him again in the future.
